Q_DESC:
Write a Program to find the distance between two points in 2D and 3D space using function overloading.
Input:
First line contains Point 1(2D)
Second line contains Point 2(2D)
Third line contains Point 1(3D)
Fourth line contains Point 2(3D)
TESTCASE_1:
90 40
60 30
60 40 20
70 30 40
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Distance between P1 & P2 is=31.6228
Distance between P1 & P2 is=24.4949
TESTCASE_2:
60 30
30 20
90 40 60
75 55 62
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Distance between P1 & P2 is=31.6228
Distance between P1 & P2 is=21.3073
TESTCASE_3:
10 10
10 10
20 20 20
10 10 10
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Distance between P1 & P2 is=0
Distance between P1 & P2 is=17.3205
